entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
